notes: All Phase 2 core visual tasks implemented. GSAP animation modules created for task creation (fly-in), completion (pulse+dim), deletion (dissolve+expand), and edit (wobble). ParticleSystem with 2000 InstancedMesh particles, Brownian drift, mouse attraction, and burst effects (fountain/explosion/implosion per event type). Scene-store wired with all animations and particle bursts. reconstructScene() for staggered entrance on load, playIntroSequence() for camera zoom-in, showEmptyState() for zero-task welcome. Store._load() adds schema validation for invalid persisted tasks. 47 tests pass, build exits 0.
